ValidationRule.description: if new account request is international, make sure 'client agrees to pay in usd' and 'client agrees to USD invoice' fields are required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.byPass_WFRule__c = FALSE,
RecordType.Name = 'New Account', International_Account__c = TRUE,
ISBLANK(text(Client_Agrees_to_Pay_in_USD__c)), ISBLANK(text(Client_Agrees_to_USD_Invoice__c))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For international accounts, please fill out whether client agrees to a US invoice or pay in USD.
